text: Choose a Thursday, Friday or Sunday to qualify for our special deal.
matchText: You qualify for our Thursday, Friday & Sunday deal!

modalDetail.title: Our Social Event Specials
modalDetail.description:
“Thursday’s the new Friday”
Party like it’s Friday on a Thursday. Enjoy a buy one get one free appetizer special for all social events on Thursday nights! 
 
“Chiavari Friday’s”
Take a load off on one of our Chiavari chairs on us. Free Chiavari Friday’s for all social events! 
 
“Sunday Funday”
Start your event anytime you want. It’s Sunday Funday!!!
modalDetail.buttonText: Inquire About Thursday, Friday or Sunday
